mapper.insert: insert ignore into ShareInfo(ShareID, ShareObj, ContactInfo, ShareMode, ShareUse, ShareNum , ShareBeginTime, ShareEndTime) VALUES ( #{shareInfo.ShareID}, #{shareInfo.ShareObj}, #{shareInfo.ContactInfo}, #{shareInfo.ShareMode}, #{shareInfo.ShareUse}, #{shareInfo.ShareNum}, #{shareInfo.ShareBeginTime}, #{shareInfo.ShareEndTime} )
mapper.update: update ShareInfo set ShareObj = #{shareInfo.ShareObj}, ContactInfo = #{shareInfo.ContactInfo}, ShareMode = #{shareInfo.ShareMode}, ShareUse = #{shareInfo.ShareUse}, ShareNum = #{shareInfo.ShareNum}, ShareBeginTime = #{shareInfo.ShareBeginTime}, ShareEndTime = #{shareInfo.ShareEndTime} where ShareID = #{shareInfo.ShareID}
mapper.select: select a.ShareID, a.ShareObj, a.ContactInfo, a.ShareMode, a.ShareUse, a.ShareNum, a.ShareBeginTime, a.ShareEndTime FROM ShareInfo as a, FruitInfo as b where a.ShareID = b.ID ORDER BY IF(b.status = 3, 0, 1), a.ShareID ASC limit #{pageNum}, 10
